channel.title: Project SickScape2.0! (!needs coders!) (317 server)
channel.description:
Hello everyone, and welcome to my thread.
[b]what is in this thread?[/b] In this thread you wil basicly find things I would like to (be) add(ed) to my server. I am new to coding so i'm asking you guys to help me with project SickScape2.0 and we could make it the best 317 around!
[b]How do you want us to receive the Source and client files?[/b] Very Simple, just mail me to: [email]theg0dpkerzs@gmail.com[/email] and I will send you the files!
what I see in most devolepment team threads are requirements, the only thng you need is having fun in coding and making a server!
[b]What does the server have till now?[b] Well, first i'm willing to make my serer Blank and add the following things:
-Walking npc's -air guitar -more commands -A bigger Mod zone with shops and custom items. -Real veng and skillcape emotes.
continued on next post.

item.title: Project SickScape2.0! (!needs coders!) (317 server)
item.dc:creator: @SickScape SickScape
item.description:
@SickScape wrote:

Hello everyone, and welcome to my thread.

what is in this thread?
In this thread you wil basicly find things I would like to (be) add(ed) to my server.
I am new to coding so i’m asking you guys to help me with project SickScape2.0 and we could make it the best 317 around!

How do you want us to receive the Source and client files?
Very Simple, just mail me to: theg0dpkerzs@gmail.com and I will send you the files!

what I see in most devolepment team threads are requirements, the only thng you need is having fun in coding and making a server!

[b]What does the server have till now?[b]
Well, first i’m willing to make my serer Blank and add the following things:

-Walking npc’s
-air guitar
-more commands
-A bigger Mod zone with shops and custom items.
-Real veng and skillcape emotes.

continued on next post.
